anaemia.
• Calcium-rich foods (milk, maas, yogurt, cheese) for strong bones and teeth.
• Foods high in Vitamin A, e.g. leafy green vegetables (kale, spinach, broccoli), orange and yellow vegetables, liver,
fish, eggs, and dairy products.
• Vitamin A improves immune system, protects from illnesses and in breastmilk helps with eyesight for the baby.
• Use iodated salt (salt with iodine) not more than one teaspoon per
